snippet: Tom Stuker has flown more than 13 million miles on United, as his job as an auto dealership consultant takes him around the world. But he has a rival.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column discusses Tom Stuker and Fred Finn, businessmen who are vying for the record number of lifetime air miles.
lead_paragraph: Tom Stuker has flown more than 13 million miles on United, as his job as an auto dealership consultant takes him around the world. But he has a rival.

headline.print_headline: United’s Top Flier of 2012 Has Eye on Global Title
headline.seo: Meet Tom Stuker, United’s Million-Mile Flier of 2012
headline.main: United’s Top Flier of 2012 Has Eye on Global Title
